channel.title: Moderators
channel.description:
Ok i know im creating a thread about this and i know im whining. But so be it.
We have moderators on this forum that dont do shit.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=5808;area=showposts;start=0
-Posted 30th october. then next post 31st jan.
ry60003000
Hardly ever posts OR moderates
Waffendennis - who> Algas -who>? Niall - good Lothy - ok Mopman - alrite mitb side sppt - alright mitb side Freddy1990 - who? Krichevskoy - idk Tico - i thought he left but he didnt Miss Silabsoft - yer but worthy? Bebe - mitb davidude36 - who? jme - yes he is now Archer - no Newty - FUCKING AMAZIN COZ HE HAS THE DEDICATION m.dog311 - FUCKING AMAZIN COZ HE HAS THE DEDICATION Chassy13 - FUCKING AMAZIN COZ HE HAS THE DEDICATION Scarecrows - No. Fucking no Apoc - who? SilentCJ - FUCKING AMAZIN COZ HE HAS THE DEDICATION FastBawlz - who? Greeny - mitb Speljohan - mitb Nashi - never heard of this dood Peeter - good Vrunk - good KO9 - good Frell - not all over MSCP Fat Cookies - very good. needs more rights si force - FUCKING AMAZIN COZ HE HAS THE DEDICATION
we have about 5 - 6 dedicated MODS
in my eyes - dedication or demotion

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:9, topic:329294”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=425683.msg3126405#msg3126405 date=1266080986]

[quote author=cows1471 link=topic=425683.msg3126396#msg3126396 date=1266080863]

[quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=425683.msg3126363#msg3126363 date=1266079935]a moderator is volunteer work only… and a title that once earn is not removed unless found inactive in the staff boards (roll call) or requested.

/thread

oh and demod newty because hes against elite avatars.
[/quote]Ok i voulenteer
[/quote]Not happening.
[/quote]exactly.[/quote]Because you’re incapable of fulfilling the role of a moderator. The maturity level of this forum is ridiculous, and if you’re to disagree with me by trying to prove yourself in any way, you’re only inflating it. Judgment upon this user base’s discretion is completely biased; most of you have enemies and friends. No one in this community is willing to learn, and I don’t mean this private server related at all. Everyone is stuck on proving themselves right, even if they’re wrong. Every once in a while, it’s fine to accept your faults and learn from them, this is significant when becoming a moderator.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I took all the people you had something negative to say and gave it my opinion

Waffendennis - Mitb Admin>Veteran
Algas -Mitb admin>Veteran
Freddy1990 - Up holding scar>Mostly MITB Side
Krichevskoy - MITB SIDE
Tico - To obsessed with MITB to mod
Miss Silabsoft - This community wouldn’t be alive most likely if it wasn’t for her.
davidude36 - Mitb Side-Real nice guy don’t worry
Archer - Could be a little more active
Scarecrows - Not so active anymore, I guess it would be logically to demod until he’s active. We don’t know the situation he’s in.
Apoc - Also known as Evil. He had some problems in the past but he’s always been dedicated
FastBawlz - Graphic Mod at MITB. Has nothing to do with this site.
Nashi - Scar mod over at MITB
Frell - He only moderates one section.

Read full topic
